meanings.sent1: The shrouding mist made it hard to see the path ahead.
meanings.sent2: The shrouding darkness of night fell upon the town.
meanings.sent3: The shrouding blanket turned out to be a playful ghost costume.
meanings.sent4: The shrouding fog wrapped the city like a mysterious cloak.
meanings.sent5: The shrouding fog felt like a soft, thick blanket around us.

meanings.definition: Concealing or hiding something from view.
meanings.sent1: The shrouding branches shielded the hidden nest from predators.
meanings.sent2: The shrouding curtain kept the surprise party a secret.
meanings.sent3: The shrouding mystery of the locked box intrigued the children.
meanings.sent4: The shrouding veil of secrecy slowly unraveled during the trial.
meanings.sent5: The shrouding cloak of invisibility made the magician disappear.
